description: This file contains an HTML webpage that provides a user interface for comparing a rendered splash screen HTML with a reference PNG image. It includes styling, layout, and JavaScript for interactivity such as toggling an overlay and adjusting overlay opacity.

methods.name: toggleOverlay
methods.description: Event handler toggling the visibility of the overlay image used for comparison.

methods.name: input
methods.description: Event handler updating the opacity of the overlay image based on slider input.
